summary: 5/13/1993: Unknown perpetrators set a fire at the Bours Health Center in Forest Grove, Oregon, United States. There were no casualties, but the abortion clinic sustained $5,000 in damages.
motive: To protest the practice of abortion and to sabotage abortion facilities operating in Oregon.
addnotes: The fire was ignited around 3:00 AM and was quickly extinguished by firefighters.  The abortion clinic was run by Dr. Peter Bours.
scite1: "Abortion Clinic Fire Quickly Quenched," The Bulletin, May 14, 1993.
scite2: "Attacks on the West Coast," The Oregonian, January 31, 1994.
scite3: "Chronological History of Arsons and Bombings Against Abortion Providers," National Abortion Federation.
